questions.title: 我很确定你就是我一直在找的人。
questions.answer: I'm sure you are the one I have been looking for.

questions.title: 我确定昨天我看见她偷偷吃了冰箱里的巧克力蛋糕。
questions.answer: I'm sure I saw her eating the chocolate cake in the refrigerator secretlyyesterday.

questions.title: 我相信我儿子会对你女儿负责的。
questions.answer: I'm sure my son will be responsible to your daughter.

questions.title: 我确信他为高考已经做了充分的准备。
questions.answer: I'm sure that he has been well prepared for the college entranceexamination.

questions.title: 我不确定他是否已经回来了。
questions.answer: I'm not sure whether he has returned.

title: ——我情绪低落而我的生活更是一团糟。
——我相信一切都会好起来的。

answer.en: I'm depressed and my life is completely out of balance.
I'm sure it'll be all right.

title: ——你为什么不通知他参加今天的新闻发布会？
——我确定我通知他了。

answer.en: Why didn't you inform him to attend today's news release conference?
I'm sure that I've informed him.
The teacher is sure that these books are interesting.
